transcript: you don't have to be smarter you have to be patient it's so easy to hear the Munger and Buffett story but like they have been doing it for 80 years and people do two years and are like why am I not rich and I'm saying two years and that's being generous most people do two months or two weeks and they're like why am I not rich Warren Buffett said this the stock market is a system that transfers well from the inpatient to the patient and I think business is the same way the capitalist system just transfers wealth to people who are more patient because they just think differently
